name: Simply Eloped
description: Offers all-inclusive elopement packages for the Big Island, Maui, and Oahu, focusing on romantic ceremonies in beautiful settings

name: Sweet Hawaii Wedding
description: Provides complete Hawaii elopement ceremonies starting at $895, including planning, photography, flowers, music, minister, and permits. They serve Oahu and Kauai

name: Islander Weddings
description: Specializes in affordable, all-inclusive Hawaii wedding packages, elopement packages, and vow renewals at Oahu's best beach venues, parks, and gardens

name: Weds Hawaii
description: Offers customizable elopement packages on Oahu, including officiant services, photography, and various location options

name: Kona Wedding Officiant
description: Provides stress-free, all-inclusive elopement packages on the Big Island of Hawaii, starting from $995, including officiant and professional photography

name: Aloha Bridal Connections
description: A wedding planning service that helps couples coordinate destination weddings in Hawaii, offering a range of packages and vendor recommendations

name: Modern Elopement
description: Designs Hawaii elopement wedding days for couples looking for intimate ceremonies, micro weddings, or vow renewals, with a focus on effortless planning

name: Hawaii Wedding Studio (HCW)
description: Offers affordable Hawaii marriage ceremonies, elopements, and civil unions at various locations on Oahu, including office-based civil ceremonies

name: Sunshower Weddings
description: An experienced team of Big Island-only wedding planners offering comprehensive services for destination weddings and elopements

name: Tropical Moon Events
description: Curates meaningful elopement experiences for adventurous couples across Hawaii, focusing on scenic venues, personalized details, and hospitality
